text: This is the most disgusting McDonald's I've ever been to. I live by campus so it's easy for me to come to this location (store #21201). I ordered seven things and all seven things came out wrong or completely burnt like a brick. I'm a nice person and they were treating me like they prepared my food like this on purpose. They didn't even apologize when I ask why they did this. The drive thru took me 30 minutes and it took me another 15 minutes to go back and get my refund. The manager was the one who took my order and she was by far the meanest and grumpiest person I've ever seen. Her only response was she was busy but there was only 5 people in the restaurant total. The people who work here are lack charisma, are spiteful and on top of that they do not clean the restaurant at all. After seeing how filthy the dining area is I can't even imagine what their kitchen must look like.

Idiots! I was in the drive thru for about 15 minutes only to get a mcchicken add pickles. When I finally get it, it I a mcchicken no mayo with like bbq sauce or something! I ate it because I was starving and pregnant and running late. When I call them no-one even answers the phone!!!!!

dirty, and rude.
sorry but dont come here.
the food tasted as if it sat in humid conditions and rot.
the people are as rude and entitled as can be. 
and the cleaniness? is no such thing.
It's McDonalds, not a class establishment to begin with. This one was a little dirty and not efficient with it's service. Waited a very long time for food during a not so busy time.

I gave it 1 star for their service. I was there around 6 a.m. and not very busy at all. I ordered 2 breakfast sandwiches at the intercom and by the time I got to the window I decided I wanted to add drinks as well. The guy at the window gave off an attitude and said for future reference place your complete order back there. I said I'm sorry, I didn't want drinks originally but decided on it when I got to the window, besides I'm paying for them. He repeated himself again, for future reference place your order back there. What would you do? Would you have stuck around? 'Cuz I didn't. Good thing I didn't give him my money. I wonder what the owner would think if he knew he lost a sale and maybe more since I'm telling you?

Horrible service on this particular location. There was this girl there this past Sunday that was extremely rude and careless. I should have talked to a manager but I did not have time. She was rolling her eyes and seemed really unhappy to be working there. I mean, I guess what do I expect from McDonalds!

THIS IS SO NASTY!! i only go for breakfast occasionally because it is on the way to work BUT they NEVER cook the english muffins enough its like they just pull them out of the bag and put cold meet n cheese on an uncooked muffin?! i only went back because i thought the first time was a fluke ... I WAS WRONG!! The workers are polite every time i go the food just SUCKS!

Did you know they serve fresh meat?  Neither did I, until my burger came out raw!  I didn't realize until two bites in when I looked down and discovered the inside was as pink and squishy as the ground beef you buy down the street, only more viscous.  Yes, you read that right.  Viscous.  Raw.  Meat.  To make matters worse, they had actively scraped the cheese off of another sandwich that was supposed to have cheese (to what purpose, I have no idea--why add cheese then scrape it off?).  This is the topping on the dung cake of this awful facility.  The staff is immature, order times take forever, management is an incompetent joke, and the kids who work there have to be high.  It's the only way I can explain their behavior of doing things like sexually trying to come onto people, leaning out the window to try and touch your hair, or any of the other bizarre behaviors I've seen there.  I have no idea what's going on at that McDonalds, but it's an utterly embarassing sideshow performance in a terrible circus of subpar performance and shame.  Would recommend entirely if you want long waits and food poisoning.

This McDonald's is an absolute mess. I ordered a meal with a coupon, and was told my total without the discount included! The manager was on the phone the whole time, the condiment area was horrifying, and two children were screaming at the top of their lungs. Get off the phone and straighten things up, manager!
HORRIBLE SERVICE was trapped in the drive though for 20 min!!!!!!!! They could warn people of the wait!!! Unbelievable- employees are rude and have a bad attitude DO NOT COME HERE
This place is horrible, it's filthy, and my order took more than 15 minutes on drive thru. I just had 2 happy meals for my kids.

Wouldn't take my order at 2 am on a Friday night because they were only taking orders from Uber. WHAT. They said they were backed up for Uber pick and up and to come back in "maybe 30 min". Get it together please. Orders only take 2 min max

I ordered from this McDonald's through uber eats. All of my burgers were incorrect. I double checked my order through uber eats and compared it to my receipt. My order that I put into uber eats was correct but my receipt from McDonalds was not the same. I'm highly irritated and upset. I called the store and all I got was a busy signal! I called 4 times. If I had my car here I would have driven to your store and complained in person but since you can not settle this issue over the phone I will take as many avenues as possible until I receive some kind of compensation.
This place is always busy and only one person working the register, this place Is very dirty and has  a bad layout which causes everyone to crowd each other,  service is very slow.

This is probably the worst and slowest McDonald's in Las Vegas. They always forget the sauces when you order McNuggets, the ice cream machine is always down, the interior looks dirty all the time, and the drive-thru times are awful. On top of that, the employees aren't kind. Dont go here.

This place always seems to disappoint. Every time I go here there's either no soap in the bathroom, no toilet seat covers or towels to dry your hands. 

I tried to upgrade from the other McDonald's Maryland Parkway in University, which is real ghetto.

Believe it or not your bathroom tells about about the service and cleanliness.  So, if I can't wash my hands? How are they? If I get sick, I'm coming for you..

This review was meant for the McDonald's on Twain & Paradise but guess what Maryland Parkway isn't any better...

Ordered at the drive through, heard the lady take my order correctly and even say out loud to the food preparers the order. Got my order and it was incorrect. Went inside and asked for my order to be fixed. As I waited there was a guy standing next to me also waiting for an order to be fixed. He got his and walked away shaking his head. I then heard the cashier tell the manager, "man, customers today..." That's when I then decided to say i just wanted my money back. Very unprofessional. As I walked away from it all I realized he didn't even give me the correct change back. He shorted me $0.65. Never going back and will be calling the higher ups.

WORST MCDONALDS EVER. I haven't had a chance to go inside, but if you have ever thought of trying out their drive thru, I HIGHLY suggest that you don't. One time, I timed my wait in the drive thru and it was 25 minutes. YES, TWENTY FIVE MINUTES!! Their customer service is horrible too. The employees make you feel like you're an inconvenience to them. Not to mention, they will stand at the window and talk to each other, while your FINISHED order is sitting right next to the window. Even though this is the closest McDonald's to UNLV, I would recommend going out of your way to try somewhere else... you'll probably even get your food faster.

Came back to check if problem of ordering medium meal and asking for large drink was resolved. To my surprise after complaining 2 times I was still refused the large drink with my medium meal. I had to show the shift manager an email the store owner sent me so I could get my drink large. I also followed up with the store manager by phone to inform him of this problem. Hopefully next time this problem will be resolved. On the plus side the restaurant is cleaner.

The worst McDonalds I've been to. I have never written a review for McDonalds ever, but for this one I have to make an exception. My family and I ordered a few fish fillets, a few sweet teas and a bottled water. They didn't have bottled water, didn't have sweet tea (I have to wait for about 10 mins for them to make some), only got the fish sandwiches first. We ate the sandwiches, they all tasted like they have been over the heating hamp for the whole day, horrible, very dry, chewy, and dark brown color. These sandwiches should be thrown away. The ice tea didn't taste like the ice tea from McDonalds either. Shame on McDonalds for allowing this franchise to run its business this way. Do not ever stop here. You'll regret it if you do.

It's kind of crazy because I've never thought I'd be writing a review for a McDonald's but let me tell you, I'm so shocked by the quality of the filet-o-fish and the quarter pounder deluxe we got. Both sandwiches look like they came out of a commercial. You can just tell the workers really took their time to prepare it.

Not only was their food at a good quality, but the girl that was working the register was super sweet. McDonalds probably don't get that many reviews because they don't have much high expectations. But this McDonalds stood out to me.

When the lady at the speaker that's supposed to be taking orders for food but leaves the mic on accident and starts calling customers fat ass and complaining about how busy it is and is rude as fuck when taking orders. Should probably learn more about customer service. And this is probably the reason why I don't support the $15 minimum wage for fast food workers. All this happened on 7/8/16 @ 11:55pm by the way.

The manager answered saying "yo, what you need?" I ordered my order and had 2 sundays, 3 cookies and a few more items. She at first forgot my 2nd Sunday and had to remind her.. then she didn't have my cookies in the bag when I got home. I will never come back again.

Some tourist/UNLV price inflation here - expect some items to be 25-30 cents above normal and they don't do the $1 any size sodas and coffee. Go a few blocks down Tropicana to the one just past McLeod / the Walmart for regular pricing (and a way nicer dining room).

All the stank-ass Maryland homebums congregate here in the morning, even though there are hella other fast food places open early right nearby they all bomb this place up for some reason. So it smells and all the seats are jammed up from opening to whenever the nearest kitchen starts serving lunch I guess.

Not surprisingly given the clientele you can also expect the men's room to be trashed and something really funky going on with the toilet if you need to stop in.

While waiting for my car to be cleaned next door, I decided I needed some breakfast.  The line was short, only 1 patron ahead of me. But what I walked into was total filth.

The trash was over flowing at 10:15 am. The tables and floors were littered with trash and spilt food and coffee. The staff were working hard and trying to have a good attitude bit who could working in a filthy restaurant.  This is the second time finding this place like this, which means the Franchise or owner does not care.  It is a shame that McDonald's allows this to tarnish a otherwise decent dining experience in most McDonald's.  Think twice before going to this location.

This location is close to the local University and has sliding glass entrance doors. This is a highly frequented location, but for some reason it doesn't get the location service love.

It has WiFi and would be a good spot to get some email finished or to watch a few videos. There isn't a lot of seats but the drink refill station is central.
This McDonald's has been the worst so far in my life . The service is horrible literally waited 15min at drive thru ...  I though drive thru meant fast !!

I came to get an egg white delight and substitute ham with sausage was pretty simple and the girl that took my order was rude and she messed it up when all I ordered was one sandwich This McDonald's is disgusting
I'm a sucker for the fries ! Yum ! Plus use their app and you'll get great deals and sometimes free items.

Worst mcdonald i ever been to, this ppl been having the expresso machine broken for over a year now . is it that hard to just get a new machine they always trynna fool mme like no bitch i now ya machine is fucking broken yall aint fooling me not only that the staff is a mess the place is disgusting . Health department need to visit here more often . sucks foreal

I wasn't going to bother leaving a comment because this location is always bad, but hey heres one anyways. I am going to start by saying nothing was good not even the trademark fries was sad and the service was disrespectful and a disgrace to the food chain that is all lol.

Worst service ever. The cashier-manager was rude. I frequent this place. She is never nice. But this morning I asked for fresh cooked hash browns she ignored me so I asked again. I asked was there a problem. She said she had a problem with my attitude?...fresh cooked hash browns?  She refused. I asked for the manager. She said she was the manager. The hash browns are always like warm here at 4:30 in the morning. That's why I asked for fresh hash browns.  I tried to call but there was no answer. I will be calling corporate and rating this McDonald's accordingly. I went to another McDonald's farther away. Paradise and Spring Mountain. They were familiar with problem there. The ratings are horrible. My family and I are boycotting this Tropicana and Maryland McDonald's. There is no excuse for the rudeness.

I've never had any major problems at this location, the interior is pretty outdated and there's no play place or anything like that. It's fine for the local college kids and people that just need to grab some coffee. I wouldn't recommend sitting down and eating inside unless you have to, a lot of very odd people come in here. I've heard that they're out of things frequently, like "meat" for example... how do you run out of meat?
Horrible customer service. Wouldn't refund my money after I ordered two SAUSAGE and EGG McMuffin..... When my associates opened their food there was ONLY bread.... No CHEESE, no SAUSAGE, no EGG.
Been sitting here for 30 minutes to get a coffee. Now after reading the other comments I realize this is normal.

The worst mc Donalds ever !!! waited 30 mins in Drive thru  and got cold hard frys and cold meat and super nasty dark chicken on mc spicy ! The employees are just trash ! Don't go stay away!! worst money spent at fast food restaurant

It's a Mc Donalds in a theorhetically good location, but getting into the driveway is awkward. The food isn't exceptional in the realm of MCDs and the two speed mountains when leaving the drive through are minor foibles. But what bums me out is the fries. This location never seems to have (and/or give me) fresh fries. Its amazing how the degredation of a McDonalds french fry goes so quickly from delicious wonder,  to cake candle garbage in minutes. Meh.

My friend sent me a snap of his food, a few days ago and I was just speechless.
I guess they tried to cover up this nasty chicken with out of pocket seasoning like they was Chef Ramsey. Wow. I guess this was just not cooking right? Let's torch the chicken and serve it to a human being. His kids wouldn't even touch the food.
I get coffee here (sometimes). I haven't died (yet). It's a good start.

Nothing much different about this McDonald's than the rest.. But if you are in a rush this drive thru is not the stop you should make . I stop here multiple times weekly and make sure I have ample time even if two cars are in front of me it's not very speedy .

The manager during the shift this morning seemed rather rude to one of his employees, an older man who looked like he was still learning, and the manager had little to no patience, constantly snapped at him and was also rushing ME to the point where I felt uncomfortable even asking for ketchup. And I was only given ONE napkin inside my utensil packet. Only came here because it's right beside the school, otherwise, I'd have gone elsewhere.

This place gets a negative zero! But had to give a one star to post!  Horrible service. 3 ladies working totally ignored me. I waited close to 10 minutes and I was the only customer in the store. I was being ignored so I left. Never will I ever step foot in this horrible Mc Donald's again. Maryland pkwy & Tropicana 11/20/16

This McDonald's is RIDICULOUS!  We went there on Oct 7th for there Rick & Morty szechuan sauce promotion which by the way FAILED MISERABLY! SHAME ON YOU MCDONALD'S.  If you want to know more about that and how McDonalds screwed everyone google it.  The managers are all rude.  No one knew what the hell they were doing and the place was filthy.  They need to shut down this location.
Horrible service!  Manager Jessica has no customer service. Why are you charging for a happy meal drink - for apple juice or milk?  It's part of the price. Or fix your menu to state that.

Ordered two peppermint mochas at the drive thru and they gave me the most horrendous, diabetes-inducing caramel mocha I've ever had in my life. It didn't even have the slightest hint of coffee flavor. I didn't have time to go back to have my order fixed, but I just wanted to punt kick the shit out of this stupid drink.
The longest wait time ever!!! Dirty dirty place. Service is horrible!! I've been to a lot of drive thrus but this OMG. 20 min wait time and I was at the freaking window already!

I'm reviewing from the drive thru.. does this location have a sense of urgent? I don't care if it's 1230 am.. it's fast food, not 20 min in the drive thru food.. I ordered at the box and then had to repeat my order 3x at the window again.. and wait longer.. wtf what a joke..

Revised..
My fries weren't even cooked and unfortunately didn't discover it until I got home.. absolutely disgusting

Nic quick service. The food is very good as usual and management very nice. The McChicken sandwich seem to be extra crispy over here. And it's very close to the Vons grocery store. Just a perfect spot to grab something to eat quick and very cheap as usual.

Brenda made my day! I was more asleep than awake & heard hazelnut caramel (when it was hazelnut or caramel) but decided on hazelnut. Brenda totally made hazelnut caramel happen!!! Usually i have the worst experiences at mcdonald's. Not this time! Thanks Brenda!!!

What a dump. No really, pure filth! Just wanted a quick salad...20 minutes later, the manager doesn't even acknowledge us standing there. I know it's McDonald's but Chisus, can the manager put down her burger and serve me please!!!
Ignore the bum sitting outside too. smdh.

Popped into this Mc Donald's today and was unpleasantly surprised by the lack of service here. The manger was yelling at the poor cashier to go and get a milk for another customer, then turned and yelled at this same cashier to take my order. While I appreciate the attention to the customer, one needs to let an individual finish a task before even starting another. Or as a manager , you can go forth and fetch what is needed. I placed my order for three cheeseburgers, small fries, and a happy meal with fries and apple slices. 

After receiving my order and finding a table that was not very dirty we sat and ate. The cheeseburgers were fine. The fries were over cooked and tasted funny. The fries were almost over cooked Golden Brown. It seems like there grease needed to be changed. I ventured to use the restroom and the ladies room was a disaster zone or could of been declared one. It looked like it had not been cleaned properly in awhile. The white powder on the floor was the worst.

Why I chose to go to McDonald's, I don't know. But I absolutely regret it as it was a waste of time! How do you forget egg in an egg & sausage biscuit -______- avoid avoid avoid!! They're probably only still open because it's proximity to campus.

Terrible place to go for dinner. The manager was rude, unprofessional, inconsiderate, and not nice. I can't believe McDonald's is hiring people like this man. I use my Mcdonald's App for a buy one get one free Sandwich. The manager had no clue how to use the bar code. He then said the scanner did not work. He had so much trouble putting in the code manually. He gave up and just said its not a valid code. The McDonald's app will not dis play an offer unless it is valid by date and barcode for special offers.  After clicking the in store use, seeing the code, not using it, the app automatically registered the coupon as being used. This manager made me waste my coupon and would not validate or compensate me for his mistake. Stop hiring incompetent people Mcdonald's. The place was also dirty and badly maintained.

Where to even begin...smh. Okay so I stopped at this McDonalds knowing that I just wanted something quick and cheap. I'm very aware that McDonalds is nothing special but, I didn't realize just how horrible my experience would be. So as I pulled up to the drive through the lady immediately told us to hold on, we didn't even get greeted. After we spent several minutes waiting for her to take our order she finally was ready. As we ordered, she failed to take down half of our order, which only consisted of a few items. We repeatedly had to say our order until she finally got it. Then after waiting for about ten min we got up to the first door to pay. The lady then proceeded to tell us our order and what do you know, IT WASN'T EVEN OUR ORDER! Then after we told her AGAIN our order she finally decided to input it into the system so we could pay. After paying, we waited about another 5 min before we then reached the second window for receiving our food. The first item we received was a soft served ice cream cone dipped in chocolate. Not only did the lady let the ice cream drip all over the cone before giving it to us but she also failed to let the dipped chocolate harden, which meant I basically was given a huge melted mess to the point where I had to throw the ice cream out because it wasn't even worth it. Then she gave us a large coke, or so we thought. My boyfriend tasted it and said it tasted horrible so he wanted a new one. The lady then told us that the coke machine was out of order so she had to give us Diet Coke instead. Um?!??? Aren't you supposed to at least let the customer know if you don't have an item on the menu before just deciding to give them a different option. So we asked for our money back which they gave us because frankly the other options weren't that great. The lady then said good bye and proceeded to close the door. We then had to tell her um hello?!? We have fries and a burrito as well! She then passed us our bag and we left. The burrito literally looked like it had been thrown together within 2 seconds and our fries we ordered were all over the bag and not even in the little cup that they are supposed to come in. Again I know I shouldn't expect much from a fast food place, let alone a McDonalds but really??? Never again is all I have to say.

Come here if you want horrible service and long, long wait times. 

My food typically comes out cold even though I'm being  told I'm waiting because the food is being cooked fresh. Typical city McDonald's where the workers and management don't really care and it's just another job to them.

Came to this 24 hours a day location at 1am and sat in the drive thru for 10 minutes and no one answered even when we said hello. We pulled up to the second window and saw someone behind the counter cleaning and completely ignored us. Ended up having to drive to another Mcdonalds instead.

My husband and I come come to LV once a month and we always come to this McDonald's for breakfast and order the same thing there big breakfast we don't eat Sausage and we always ask to sub the sausage for hash browns or eggs there is sweet old lady who
Always has no problem with it and there's always the manager who is always rude and be like we can't do that...!!!!!No other McDonald's has a problem why do u!!!! Will not be back to this place at all!!!!
This place sucks. They never have the all the things I order. I shouldn't have to stop to check and see if they got all my things.
Josephine are cashier was very friendly. The whole staff was very nice and working hard!

Itis COMPLETELY INAPPROPRIATE to be called SWEETIE by the person taking your drive through order.  It is also bad management to not replace your coffee machine before running out of iced coffee.   There's only a McDonald's everywhere.

I've never been to a McDonald's that constantly messes up my order as much as this one does. They're are some very nice people who work there,but majority of the staff does not care and rushed through the orders. Too many times have I been give way less items than what I paid for.

Dirty, disgusting facility. No ice at soda fountain, no lids/straws, old used straw wrappers on the counter in front of the soda fountain, and all of the tables were some kind of sticky. Also various trash/wrappers littering the floor. Please, find another location.

This place doesn't even deserve one star is a piece of crap all employees are rude as hell and they also never carry anything always out of something even the simplest thing like ranch . They pretend they have it wait in line for a long time and then you get to the window to be informed that they don't have that item and if you would like to change your order . Absolute ridiculous and shameful.
If i could give u people 0  i would i been sittinghere for 20 and all for 2 sodas. This is the 3 and final time  i hate this place owners must be jewish not wanting to hire more fucking people

We've been coming here almost daily. Yesterday (6/4/2017) we came in about 10:45 for breakfast. A homeless man had ordered and asked for an extra box. This young, short, Mexican girl wouldn't give him one. He asked to speak to the manager and he waited. The manager never came out. He ordered two burgers, a pop, and two large fries, he wanted the box so his fries didn't get cold before he could eat them. He finally asked for his money back and she couldn't even give him his $10.68 back, she shorted him. Maybe they need to give him her job. I don't care who you are, in hospitality you need to treat everyone with respect. I will never come back to this McDonalds because they have no idea on how to treat their customers. You can never tell if a person is rich or poor by looking at them. I know several millionaires and you'd never know it by looking at them. I also know people who act like their millionaires and owe far more than they are worth.

Drive thru customer service was easy and efficient.

On a thanksgiving night, not much to choose from in fast food. But of course McDonald's is open! For that I am appreciative.

Big Mac was yuck, but I love the fries! Best fries ever!
What is the meat in that Big Mac? Sure doesn't taste as I remember growing up?

 Drive thru girl was sweet and they were very fast. So, thank you for feeding me on Thanksgiving!
Worst one I've been to poor service and everything broke or just don't have it need to close this place down edit BTW ordered filet o fish had to throw away bread was so stale I couldn't eat it.

I go to UNLV right next store. I'm a huge fan of McDonald's ,just ask my mom. Every single time I come here something goes wrong. It's a mix between rude employees, gross tasting food, order shortage, always a "broken" ice cream machine, and the workers being so lazy they make there own rules up sometimes. Just go to the McDonald's that's 5 minutes down the street on Maryland and Twain.

What kind of mcdonalds doesn't have nuggets!!!!!!

It was lunch time and my little sister wanted some chicken nuggets so mcdonalds is obviously the place to go. I ordered two of the 10 piece chicken nugget meals and the lady, with a very rude response might I add, said "we have no nuggets." Uhh, okay. In food service, you should at least say "I'm sorry" and say things in a polite manner. But anyway, I had to change up my order. When I was telling her my order, politely, she kept on getting whatever I was saying wrong. And then was still being really rude. I don't understand how a mcdonalds can have really bad service. It's worse than some of the places in Chinatown. 

Definitely won't be returning to this location. Sorry, not sorry!
